text: Vitrolles is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D20, D120, D220, D420 and D1085 roads pass through the commune. The A51 autoroute also passes through Vitrolles. == Location == The commune borders the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Vitrolles, Hautes-Alpes
